text: Muzaffar al-Din Uzbek, also known as Özbeg ibn Muhammad Pahlawan, was the fifth and last ruler (atabeg) of the Eldiguzids from 1210 to 1225, during the later Seljuk and Khwarezmian periods. He was married to Malika Khatun, widow of Toghrul III, the last sultan of the Seljuk Empire. ==Sources== * * Category:13th-century monarchs in the Middle East Category:13th-century Turkic people Category:Eldiguzids
title: Muzaffar al-Din Uzbek
